body.name: Sweetcrispy Arched Full Length Mirror 59"x16" Full Body Floor Mirror Standing Hanging or Leaning Wall, Arch Wall Mirror with Stand Aluminum Alloy Thin Frame for Bedroom Cloakroom,Black

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Aluminum Alloy Frame Mirror Full Length-Newly Upgraded Glass

FULL SIZE: The standing mirror is 59" in length and 16" in width, large enough for you to see your entire figure in a single glance. This is not only a body mirror, but also a piece of art in your house which can bring you a nice mood every day.

ALUMINUM ALLOY FRAME: The wall mirror full length is surrounded by anti-rust and colorfast aluminum alloy. The very thin frame (only 0.23" wide on the front), is durable and has a shiny appearance. Wire drawing treats are simpler and more textured.

UPGRADED NANO GLASS: Our long mirror is made of durable 3 mm high-definition nano glass. Upgrade nano glass with pure silver layer is more high definition and not easy to break. Even if it is accidentally damaged by an external force, the broken pieces of the mirror will not splash in all directions.

ALL-MATCH: No Assembly Required. The floor length mirror can stand anywhere with the standing holder. You also can lean it against a wall, or you can hang it vertically on the wall for space-saving. It is suitable for a bedroom, living room, cloakroom, home gym, corridor, clothing shop, etc.

100% REFUND/REPLACEMENT: Our mirror packaging fully passes the international drop test. In the unlikely event that a product arrives damaged, please feel free to contact us. A full refund or free replacement of mirror(s) damaged on arrival, no return required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars About the mirror
reviews.reviewText: "This mirror is a true find! Its elegant design seamlessly fits into any room, adding a touch of sophistication. The reflection quality is exceptional, providing impeccable clarity. The size is ideal, and the integrated lighting is a real plus for flawless makeup touch-ups.Furthermore, the quality of service and delivery pleasantly surprised me. The package arrived quickly and was carefully packed, ensuring the mirror was in perfect condition. The customer service was also responsive and professional, addressing my inquiries with courtesy. A hassle-free shopping experience that reflects the brand's commitment to customer satisfaction. Highly recommended!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift and it was easy to tote around and finally display! Gorgeous mirror and great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mirror, SUPERIOR PACKING
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is lovely and just what I needed. The stand folds out and stabilizes it nicely. I didn't want one that hangs over the door because those always bang around and look cheap. This one has a nice finish and came with hardware to hang it on the wall. I have plaster walls, so that wouldn't work. This is a great solution!But, before I could see the mirror to adore it, I had to cut open the ends of the box and carefully open the box lengthwise. I laid it on my bed to do this. Once the box was open, it was clear what other reviewers had said was true. The people who packaged this mirror for shipping are geniuses. It had several layers of Styrofoam for cushioning, sat in a wood frame for stabilization and protection, and had a piece of plastic to protect the mirror from smudging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: I never like to order breakable items online for fear of what horrors they will go through shipping but I'd had my eye on this one for awhile and finally decided to commit. I'm SO impressed! Not only is the mirror itself really decent quality - light weight and easy to maneuver but still *looks* heavy and expensive - but the packaging far exceeded my expectations. I've ordered mirrors online from other retailers and none of them have been packaged as well as this one! There was a wood border (wood!) lines with styrofoam all the way around the edge of the mirror and the flat sides were secured by even more styrofoam.If you are hesitating on ordering due for fear of damage via shipping I'd say you don't have to worry about that with this item. 100% worth it and really impressive quality for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not shatter proof AT ALL
reviews.reviewText: First mirror arrived shattered. Seller sent a replacement at no charge, but the second mirror / box also arrived broken. Super disappointed because the mirror is beautiful & the perfect size. The only return option now is to send the damaged box & mirror back, wouldn’t be a huge deal except I can’t fit the mirror in my car to take it to UPS. So now I have two broken mirrors & loss of the money I spent to begin with. Lame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved that my mirror came in a sturdy box as soon as I opened I loved it perfect for price standing it up it kinda out balances but not to bad as I will be placing on the wall. Mirror reflection is perfect too. If ur looking to purchase and see it as a great price I recommend to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was really nervous ordering a mirror thru the mail, but it was packaged perfectly. It doesn't have a scratch on it and it looks perfect in my apartment no matter where I put it. Definitely recommend buying this mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a mirror
reviews.reviewText: The mirror arrived well-packed and in good condition. I was too lazy to measure my old mirror in comparison, so this mirror is bigger than planned. Therefore, I decided not to hang it on the wall, but just leaned it instead. It comes with directions and mounting screws to hang it on the wall. With the weight, I would feel more comfortable hanging from the wall studs. The spacing of the holes on the back of mirror seem to line up with where two studs would be in my wall.
